description.ruby-sapphire:
A wish that restores HP.
It takes time to work.
description.emerald:
A wish that restores HP.
It takes time to work.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A self-healing move
that restores half
the full HP on the
next turn.
description.diamond-pearl:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP
in the next turn.
description.platinum:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP
in the next turn.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP
in the next turn.
description.black-white:
One turn after this move is used,
the target’s HP is restored by
half the user’s maximum HP.
description.black-2-white-2:
One turn after this move is used,
the target’s HP is restored by
half the user’s maximum HP.
description.x-y:
One turn after this move is used,
the target’s HP is restored by
half the user’s max HP.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
One turn after this move is used,
the target’s HP is restored by
half the user’s max HP.
description.sun-moon:
One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its
replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s
max HP.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its
replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s
max HP.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its
replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s
max HP.
description.sword-shield:
One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its
replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s
max HP.

effect.full: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP.  If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user's max HP.  If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.shortEffect: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
